'''2.1.13085''' ([[wikipedia:Microsoft Windows|Windows]]), '''2.1.13086''' ([[wikipedia:Linux|Linux]]), or '''2.1.13084''' ([[wikipedia:macOS|macOS]]) is an update to the [[Minecraft launcher|launcher]]. This launcher was released as a [[Launcher version history|beta version]] on March 19, 2020 and the full version of [[launcher]] was released on March 20, 2020.

== Fixes ==
* {{bug|MCL-13389}}: Launch status text is not positioned correctly
* {{bug|MCL-13390}}: Launcher is missing the 20w11a and 20w12a changelogs
* {{bug|MCL-13393}}: The test launcher download the new game，the display
